title: So Zoe is...
body:
...still not fun to play against. Regardless of win rate, her kit is just very toxic. Every time I see her pop 3 flashes in a row I remember how in pro play making someone pop their flash is a big deal because of how useful it is, and I just laugh in despair. 

Anyone else remember when Riot said they were changing Nidalee's kit because having a spear come from off-screen and do tons of damage wasn't healthy? I 'member.

replies.body: Name something that IS Fun to play against and you'll open an entire doorway of Wtf is this games state rn
Let's be honest here, there are VERY few champions that aren't "fun" to play against.

Fun to play against, that's very rare.

But I think everyone really means **fair** to play against.

And that is not uncommon. There are a lot of healthy champions in this game, but a worryingly increasing number of toxic ones.

well, fun and fairness are often intertwined.  It's when things go overboard that things go wrong.  For example, master yi is supposed to stomp lower elos and fall off the higher you get because his kit depends upon a lack of crowd control.  Never fun to play against but he was "fair"

there were plenty of champs that were fun to play against thouh and usually they were the champs with the least intrusive amount of "hey, that's not right!"

take ziggs for example.  He can be decent to play against, but what gets frustrating is the hit-box of his Q is very forgiving.  The animation can miss you entirely and the explosion can still hit you

then there are champions that start to ignore the rules of the game...and the horrid problems that come with that

She can pop 3 flashes in a row only if her enemies popped at least 2. So yes, its a pretty big deal.
Meanwhile other champions have 3 mobility spells ready whenever needed but its somewhy ok
Like imagine Zoe having {{champion:105}}  E on her W instead.
She can't oneshot people with her Q alone. If she hits E, you have enough time to remove it, run/dash away or hide behind minions/allies. If Zoe ults to hit her Q, she risks getting hit by whatever is aimed at her starting point, she can't just throw and run away
And Nidalee still can throw a spear from off-screen and do tons of damage.
She cant oneshot with Q alone? Excuse me sir? Are we in the same planet? This is hillarious

Let's take a look shall we? Zoe Q does at max distance (without putting you to sleep) (170+60% AP)x1.5. So With 1000 AP She does (170+600)x1.5, which is 1155dmg. Even a squishy at level 18 has over 1500hp, and that 1155 is assuming no MR, and that she actually has 1000AP, Which based on typical builds... Rabbadon 120, Lichbane 80, Ludens 90, Morrello 70, and we'll throw in Void 70. So that's 430+40%=602, which isn't even close to 1000, so REALLY her damage is (170+361)x1.5=797. So... yes we are on this planet.
Zoe player alert!
OMG you're right I forgot if you don't play Zoe you're incapable of doing math. Great response though.

Zoe ain't that bad. And it's honestly not like nid isn't chunking ppl from half a lane away.

Kinda funny How Zoe is considered this horrible by the boards when the boards also glorifies skillshots like they're the Pinnacle of skill.

Excuse me, one thing is a skillshot that u see coming to you nd u can dodge or not, it depends on how and when and to where it is shot, but u see it coming from a champion that is actually in your screen; another thing is a skillshot that comes from nowhere from a champion that is a screen away from where you are and u just dont see it coming. So yes skillshots are nice and beautiful and when you hit you Lux Q on 2 enemies its like woooow,  but Zoe is way too unfair. U cant treat Zoe’s thingy the same as “general skillshots”. Thats not fair

last time i checked zoe's paddle star has particles and thus is visible, just as visible as lux Q. 

Now the limitations on the ability mean she it can't throw it much farther than nid or lux as she needs to be in a position relative to the projectile's end point.
So yeah, she could potentially fire that shit at you from a mile away, but that would require her to put in a bunch of extra work and if zoe popping outta nowhere doesn't alarm you that it's coming, idk what will. so no i honestly can't count it as a general skillshot as i'd argue it's harder than those.

in lane her poke will be more oppressive than nidalee simply because it's trajectory is more flexible, it's range doesn't really matter that much in comparison.
Yeah if you think zoe is anything like that nidalee, you didn't play mid much back then.

must be horrible this old nidalee u speak of bc zoe already one shots u -ok maybe 80% hp bar u for landing her abilities once
which she keeps spamming all lane phase long

Zoe needs to hit you with e and doesn't even come close to old nida waveclear past 6. Also, zoe has no heal. Also, using zoe R opens you to being hit by everything and making you vulnerable to a gank. Old nida was jump in cougar oneshot wave throw Qs till you hit.

Did you play against the sniperwolf in season 3?
are you a midlaner or you just making assmuptions about zoe?

I don't see zoe at 50% ban/pickrate in diamond+ like sniperwolf was so. Just a simple fact check can let you know. ;)

If you want to pick zoe and 1v1 me in midlane I will be more than happy to. I'll let you pick my champ too. 

We won't have junglers but that's your advantage with zoe since she is so vulnerable to ganks.
you seriously going to ask for an 1v1 every time i confront you about something?

Well, since you seem to dislike facts, I don't see what other options I have to demonstrate to you how zoe can't do the things you claim. You willing to accept zoe isn't able to do the things you claim if I find a stream of someone playing against her? (keep in mind zoe is hella stronger past masters compared to bellow)

dislike facts LMFAO and u seem to base all ur knowledge on aram games and assumptions

zoe doesn't need to hit her E to one shot u

the heck man even i play zoe and don't support nerfing her but i am not as delusional as you are

If you are 0/0/0 and zoe is 0/0/0 and you are even levels. NO she can't 100-0 you without landing her E. Show me 1 clip where that happened.

Or, you know, 1v1 me and oneshot me without E idk man.
LOL 1v1's prove nothing btw i killed a garen building mr only as zoe in 1V1 so should zoe be balanced around one shotting juggernauts because of that?

As a Zoe Main, no she cannot kill you with impunity. In fact her damage is lower than many champs early, It's only post Ludens that she start's being able to straight up 100-0 somebody. If you don't want it happening, buy a Banshee's it is a HUGE counter to her, cause she needs E and Q to kill somebody unless they are already hurt, and if you have Banshee's they cannot get off that combo.
Not to mention the mr from banshee is often enough to stop her from one shotting you with her combo (without the shield), at least until she has more items.

Especially when the alternative laners hit their full combos but deal drastically reduced damage without stats (typically healed up by 1 health pot), run oom, and have limited defense options. The assassins still have to hit their stuff though, a -normal gold value- assassin will do piss poor damage if not.
ah yes, I was a terrible player for getting hit by auto attacks and ignite. well this is about the level of argument I'd expect from a zoe main lmao

If auto's and ignite killed you, what were you doing back? Ignite does between like 100-300dmg, and her empowered auto's do 16-130+20% AP, and have no reset timer on her autos, so she still has to attack at her attack speed. Sylas does by comparison 9-60+100%AD+20%AP and does have resets on his autos. So a Sylas is more likely to kill you while missing all abilities than a Zoe is.

>what were you doing back?

I was hitting her with spells :) 

>Sylas does by comparison

If your spells do less than that you deserve to lose, she has to hit you with 5 auto's and an ignite (if you're squishy) with no attack resets and casting a spell in between all of those.
